scripts.cleanup: rm ../favicon.ico; rm ../index.html; rm ../manifest.json; rm ../asset-manifest.json; rm ../service-worker.js; rm -rf ../static;
scripts.build: npm run cleanup; react-scripts build; mv build/* ../; rm -rf build
scripts.build-and-push: npm run build; cd ..; git add .; git commit -m 'rebuild'; git push origin master; cd code;
